text: Ravipadu may refer to: == Andhra Pradesh, India == * Ravipadu, Narasaraopet mandal, a village in the Narasaraopet mandal, Guntur district, Andhra Pradesh, India * Ravipadu, Pedanandipadu mandal, a village in the Pedanandipadu mandal, Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh, India == Telangana, India == * Ravipadu, Bibinagar mandal, a village in the Bibinagar mandal, Nalgonda district, Telangana, India
title: Ravipadu
